name: @cdf/auth-devicecert
description: API Gateway custom authorizer that authenticates based on a supplied device certificate
author: Rahul Sareen <rssareen@amazon.com>

scripts.test: npm run lint && NODE_ENV= NODE_CONFIG_DIR='./src/config' nyc jest
scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_CONFIG=$(cat ${CONFIG_LOCATION}/commands/${npm_package_config_environment}-config.json) NODE_CONFIG_DIR='./src/config' concurrently "npm run build -- -w" "nodemon dist/lambda_proxy.js"
scripts.prebundle: npm run clean && npm run build && cpy package.json dist && cpy src/config/* dist/config/ && make-dir build && cd dist && make-dir node_modules && pnpm i --prod --shamefully-flatten --force
scripts.postbundle:
echo '

******   node_modules have been flattened and resolved in production mode.  If this is a dev environment, make sure you run `pnpm run reset` from the root to reset.'
